mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.code AS "code", a.sccode AS "sccode", a.cinvcode AS "cinvcode", a.cinvname AS "cinvname", a.cinvstd AS "cinvstd", a.batchno AS "batchno", a.cangku AS "cangku.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.bgid AS "bgid", a.num as "num", a.bgcode AS "bgcode", a.sych AS "sych", cangku.name AS "cangku.name"
LEFT JOIN base_cangku cangku ON cangku.id = a.cangku
mapper.select: select max(batchno) from business_ruku_product where batchno like concat(#{ymd},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_ruku_product( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, code, sccode, cinvcode, cinvname, cinvstd, batchno, cangku, remarks, bgid, bgcode,num, sych ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{code}, #{sccode}, #{cinvcode}, #{cinvname}, #{cinvstd}, #{batchno}, #{cangku.id}, #{remarks}, #{bgid}, #{bgcode},#{num}, #{sych} )
mapper.update: UPDATE business_ruku_product SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, code = #{code}, sccode = #{sccode}, cinvcode = #{cinvcode}, cinvname = #{cinvname}, cinvstd = #{cinvstd}, batchno = #{batchno}, cangku = #{cangku.id}, remarks = #{remarks}, bgid = #{bgid}, bgcode = #{bgcode}, sych = #{sych} WHERE id = #{id}
